entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 30 percent chance of wet flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High 7. POP 30%
